meta_title: What is a SKU? Defining Stock Keeping Units for Maintenance
meta_description: 70% of maintenance delays stem from poor part tracking. Define SKU accurately to bridge the gap between inventory and uptime with Factory AI's unified platform.
title: Define SKU: The Definitive Guide to Stock Keeping Units in Modern Maintenance and MRO

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Define SKU: The Definitive Guide to Stock Keeping Units in Modern Maintenance and MRO

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern, well-organized industrial maintenance warehouse. In the foreground, a diverse team of two maintenance professionals (one male, one female) are collaborating. They are wearing clean, high-visibility vests, white hard hats, and safety glasses. One person is pointing toward a neatly labeled shelf of spare parts (motors and bearings), while the other holds a rugged industrial tablet (showing only the back of the device). The warehouse features high ceilings, bright LED lighting, and clearly marked floor lanes. The atmosphere is efficient and high-tech. No text or logos are visible on the equipment or shelving. Full-body view of the professionals.
